title: A Gaunt Navalny Makes First Court Appearance Since Ending Hunger Strike
content:
1. A Gaunt Navalny Makes First Court Appearance Since Ending Hunger Strike  NPR
  2. Navalny appears in court for first time since ending hunger strike, saying 'I'm just an awful skeleton'  CNN
  3. Visibly gaunt Alexei Navalny makes first public appearance since hunger strike  CBS This Morning
  4. Gaunt Navalny attacks Putin as network is disbanded  BBC News
  5. Navalny’s Network is Disbanding, Citing Pressure From Putin  The New York Times
